plot: Bob Beefkins, former Rebel pilot, has been reassigned to the trenches on Hoth. He inadvertently leads the Empire to the Rebel Base.
title: Cheap Seats 2: Cheaper Seats
plot_es: Bob Beefkins, former Rebel pilot, has been reassigned to the trenches on Hoth. He inadvertently leads the Empire to the Rebel Base.
plot_en: Bob Beefkins, former Rebel pilot, has been reassigned to the trenches on Hoth. He inadvertently leads the Empire to the Rebel Base.
